languages.text: "Павший, вознесшийся..." {n}Караэль снисходительно качает головой.{/n} "За Эзирраеш пойдут те, кто сейчас боится поднять голову против наших врагов. И их много — столько же, сколько стояли когда-то за Иремерисс, отваживая желающих свергнуть ее. Посмотрим, кто придет за восставшей Опустошительной бурей. Посмотрим, кто придет умереть".

"Fallen, risen..." {n}Kharael shakes his head condescendingly.{/n} "Those who now fear to raise their head against our enemies will follow the Aezyrraesh. And there are many, as many as Yremeryss once had — and her army of lackeys drove out most who wished to overthrow her. We will see who comes for the Reaving Tempest reborn. We will see who comes to die."
languages.original_text: "Павший, вознесшийся..." {n}Караэль снисходительно качает головой.{/n} "За Эзирраеш пойдут те, кто сейчас боится поднять голову против наших врагов. И их много — столько же, сколько стояли когда-то за Иремерисс, отваживая желающих свергнуть ее. Посмотрим, кто придет за восставшей Опустошительной бурей. Посмотрим, кто придет умереть".

And there are many, as many as Yremeryss once had — and her army of lackeys deterred most who wished to overthrow her. We will see who comes for the Reaving Tempest reborn. We will see who comes to die."

And there are many, as many as Yremeryss once had — and her army of lackeys drove out most who wished to overthrow her. We will see who comes for the Reaving Tempest reborn. We will see who comes to die."
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: "Gefallen, auferstanden ..." {n}Kharael schüttelt verächtlich den Kopf.{/n} "Wer jetzt fürchtet, den Kopf gegen unsere Feinde zu erheben, wird den Aezyrraesh folgen. Und es gibt viele, so viele wie Yremeryss einst hatte — und ihre Armee von Schergen hat die meisten vertrieben, die sie stürzen wollten. Wir werden sehen, wer kommt, um den plündernden Sturm herauszufordern. Wir werden sehen, wer kommt, um zu sterben."
languages.original_text: "Fallen, risen..." {n}Kharael shakes his head condescendingly.{/n} "Those who now fear to raise their head against our enemies will follow the Aezyrraesh. And there are many, as many as Yremeryss once had — and her army of lackeys drove out most who wished to overthrow her. We will see who comes for the Reaving Tempest reborn. We will see who comes to die."

traits.locale_text: "Gefallen, auferstanden ..." {n}Kharael schüttelt verächtlich den Kopf.{/n} "Wer jetzt fürchtet, den Kopf gegen unsere Feinde zu erheben, wird den Aezyrraesh folgen. Und es gibt viele, so viele wie Yremeryss einst hatte — und ihre Armee von Schergen hat die meisten vertrieben, die sie stürzen wollten. Wir werden sehen, wer kommt, um den plündernden Sturm herauszufordern. Wir werden sehen, wer kommt, um zu sterben."
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: “陨落，然后崛起……”{n}卡瑞尔居高临下地摇了摇头。{/n}“那些原本不敢反抗我们敌人的人，如今会再次追随艾泽拉什的旗帜。像这样的人还有很多，就像伊芮梅莉斯曾经的仆从一样多。曾有很多人想推翻她的统治，但最后都被她的仆从大军碾为齑粉。至于现在，我们可以看看谁会让狂风阴谋团得到重生，而谁又会丢掉性命。”
languages.original_text: "Fallen, risen..." {n}Kharael shakes his head condescendingly.{/n} "Those who now fear to raise their head against our enemies will follow the Aezyrraesh. And there are many, as many as Yremeryss once had — and her army of lackeys drove out most who wished to overthrow her. We will see who comes for the Reaving Tempest reborn. We will see who comes to die."

traits.locale_text: “陨落，然后崛起……”{n}卡瑞尔居高临下地摇了摇头。{/n}“那些原本不敢反抗我们敌人的人，如今会再次追随艾泽拉什的旗帜。像这样的人还有很多，就像伊芮梅莉斯曾经的仆从一样多。曾有很多人想推翻她的统治，但最后都被她的仆从大军碾为齑粉。至于现在，我们可以看看谁会让狂风阴谋团得到重生，而谁又会丢掉性命。”
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: « Déchu, réhabilité... » {n}Kharael secoue la tête avec condescendance.{/n} « Ceux qui craignent de tenir tête à nos ennemis suivront les Aezyrraesh. Et ils sont nombreux, autant que pour Yremeryss autrefois... et son armée de sous-fifres avait chassé la plupart de ses détracteurs. Nous verrons bien qui répondra présent pour le retour de la Tempête ravageuse. Nous verrons bien qui viendra mourir. »
languages.original_text: "Fallen, risen..." {n}Kharael shakes his head condescendingly.{/n} "Those who now fear to raise their head against our enemies will follow the Aezyrraesh. And there are many, as many as Yremeryss once had — and her army of lackeys drove out most who wished to overthrow her. We will see who comes for the Reaving Tempest reborn. We will see who comes to die."

traits.locale_text: « Déchu, réhabilité... » {n}Kharael secoue la tête avec condescendance.{/n} « Ceux qui craignent de tenir tête à nos ennemis suivront les Aezyrraesh. Et ils sont nombreux, autant que pour Yremeryss autrefois... et son armée de sous-fifres avait chassé la plupart de ses détracteurs. Nous verrons bien qui répondra présent pour le retour de la Tempête ravageuse. Nous verrons bien qui viendra mourir. »
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: «Caído, resurgido...». {n}Kharael niega con la cabeza, condescendiente.{/n} «Quienes ahora temen levantar la cabeza contra nuestros enemigos seguirán a los Aezyrraesh. Y son muchos, tantos como tuvo Yremeryss... y eso que su ejército de lacayos expulsó a la mayoría de los que buscaban derrocarla. Veremos quiénes se enfrentan a la Tempestad Asoladora renacida. Veremos quiénes buscan la muerte».
languages.original_text: "Fallen, risen..." {n}Kharael shakes his head condescendingly.{/n} "Those who now fear to raise their head against our enemies will follow the Aezyrraesh. And there are many, as many as Yremeryss once had — and her army of lackeys drove out most who wished to overthrow her. We will see who comes for the Reaving Tempest reborn. We will see who comes to die."

traits.locale_text: «Caído, resurgido...». {n}Kharael niega con la cabeza, condescendiente.{/n} «Quienes ahora temen levantar la cabeza contra nuestros enemigos seguirán a los Aezyrraesh. Y son muchos, tantos como tuvo Yremeryss... y eso que su ejército de lacayos expulsó a la mayoría de los que buscaban derrocarla. Veremos quiénes se enfrentan a la Tempestad Asoladora renacida. Veremos quiénes buscan la muerte».
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: 「堕ちる、蘇る…」{n}カラエルは馬鹿にするように頭を振る。{/n}「我々の敵に対して頭を上げることを恐れる者は、アエジレシュに従うだろう。そしてイレメリスがかつて持っていたほど多くの戦力がいる。彼女の配下の軍が彼女を失脚させようとする輩はほとんど追い出した。誰が略奪の嵐の再誕に集まるかを見るとしよう。誰が死ぬために集まるのかを」
languages.original_text: "Fallen, risen..." {n}Kharael shakes his head condescendingly.{/n} "Those who now fear to raise their head against our enemies will follow the Aezyrraesh. And there are many, as many as Yremeryss once had — and her army of lackeys drove out most who wished to overthrow her. We will see who comes for the Reaving Tempest reborn. We will see who comes to die."

traits.locale_text: 「堕ちる、蘇る…」{n}カラエルは馬鹿にするように頭を振る。{/n}「我々の敵に対して頭を上げることを恐れる者は、アエジレシュに従うだろう。そしてイレメリスがかつて持っていたほど多くの戦力がいる。彼女の配下の軍が彼女を失脚させようとする輩はほとんど追い出した。誰が略奪の嵐の再誕に集まるかを見るとしよう。誰が死ぬために集まるのかを」
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: "Yıkılmış, yükselmiş..." {n}Kharael, aşağılayıcı bir tavırla başını sallıyor.{/n} "Düşmanlarımıza kafa tutmaktan korkan herkes, artık Aezyrraesh'i takip edecek. Üstelik sayıları da çok, hatta Yremeryss'in bir zamanlarki dalkavuklar ordusu kadar varlar. Adamları, onu konumundan etmek isteyen birçoklarını püskürtmüştü. Yeniden doğan Müfteris Kasırga'ya kimlerin düşman olacağını, kimlerin öleceğini göreceğiz."
languages.original_text: "Fallen, risen..." {n}Kharael shakes his head condescendingly.{/n} "Those who now fear to raise their head against our enemies will follow the Aezyrraesh. And there are many, as many as Yremeryss once had — and her army of lackeys drove out most who wished to overthrow her. We will see who comes for the Reaving Tempest reborn. We will see who comes to die."

traits.locale_text: "Düşmüş, yükselmiş..." {n}Kharael aşağılayıcı bir tavırla başını sallıyor.{/n} "Düşmanlarımıza kafa tutmaktan korkan herkes artık Aezyrraesh'i takip edecektir. Çok sayıdalardır ve de. Yremeryss'in bir zamanlar sahip olduğu kadar çok hem de, ki dalkavuklar ordusu, onu konumundan etmek isteyen çok kişiyi püskürtmüştür. Yeniden doğan Müfteris Kasırga'ya kimin geleceğini göreceğiz. Gelenlerin hangilerinin öleceğini de göreceğiz."
traits.speaker: Karael
